text: 1.21: Lu 1.31 naŋga, 2.21 naŋga, Sɨ 4.12 naŋga, 13.23 naŋga, 13.38Nu kru ñɨŋi kavɨrɨmandɨ. Nu tɨhi nuŋandɨ krunavundi ñamba vanavana andɨndu haŋɨnɨŋ sɨhiŋgata nurɨŋ ŋguramata aŋga mɨŋɨmandɨ. Harɨm nuŋ ñɨmbi ŋguta Jisas vamba amba, vami.1.21 Hibru kuyuyɨ ñɨmbi Jisas vava nɨŋandɨhin Aru nɨma krunavundiŋ aŋga mɨŋamɨŋa vava kuyu maña ŋandi. Ñɨmbi Jisas vava nɨ, Grik kuyuyɨndu. Hibru kuyuyɨ Josua vandu.
